name: Thorn Cage
flavor: Vines burst forth from the ground and bind your foe, slowly closing around them.

metadata.flavor: Vines burst forth from the ground and bind your foe, slowly closing around them.

effects.tier1: 10 + I damage; A < WEAK, restrained (save ends)
effects.tier2: 15 + I damage; A < AVERAGE, restrained (save ends)
effects.tier3: 21 + I damage; A < STRONG, restrained (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: While restrained this way, the target takes 10 damage at the start of each of your turns.
